metadata.title: CVE-2018-18226 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
In Wireshark 2.6.0 to 2.6.3, the Steam IHS Discovery dissector couldconsume system memory. This was addressed inepan/dissectors/packet-steam-ihs-discovery.c by changing thememory-management approach.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18226` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.6.4-2~ubuntu14.04.1
libwireshark11 - 2.6.4-2~ubuntu14.04.1
libwiretap8 - 2.6.4-2~ubuntu14.04.1
libwscodecs2 - 2.6.4-2~ubuntu14.04.1
libwsutil9 - 2.6.4-2~ubuntu14.04.1
tshark - 2.6.4-2~ubuntu14.04.1
wireshark - 2.6.4-2~ubuntu14.04.1
wireshark-common - 2.6.4-2~ubuntu14.04.1
wireshark-gtk - 2.6.4-2~ubuntu14.04.1
wireshark-qt - 2.6.4-2~ubuntu14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.4-2~ubuntu14.04.1').
